name: ubuntu
description: Glasgow Graduation Project - Women Shelter system

scripts.install: npm --prefix server install & npm --prefix client install
scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development npm run client & npm --prefix server run dev
scripts.win-dev: npm run client & npm --prefix server run dev
scripts.build: cd client && npm install && npm install --only=dev --no-shrinkwrap && npm run build && cd ../
